original_title: Ubistvo na svirep i podmukao naƒçin i iz niskih pobuda
overview: An eminent Belgrade physician is found murdered. The investigation reveals dark side of his character - illegal abortions and abuse of his wife. The wife's lover becomes the prime suspect. The newspaper reporter, however, starts his own investigation. Besides being a crime story, this movie in quasi-documentary fashion presents alternative cultural scene of Belgrade in late sixties.
title: Murder Commited in a Sly and Cruel Manner and from Low Motives
